resources.string: This service helps App Time Limiter detect when chosen apps is in the foreground.\\n\\nPress back twice to return to the app.
To detect when chosen Apps are in the foreground, you need to enable the App Time Limiter Accessibility Service in your device settings.
Accessibility Service Disabled. \nThis also needs to be enabled before other applications can be monitored. \nClick on the More button at the bottom of the screen
